name: Clone Cleanup
description:
Your clones have risen against you! Unlock upgrades to defeat them, but beware, your clones have the very same tricks as you. Can you outsmart them?

Created for GMTK Jam 2019 with the theme "Only One".

Controls:

Left/Right to move
Up/Spacebar to jump
Z/X/C/V to use certain items
Esc to restart level

Only if you're really stuck: K to kill all enemies
